features: 12-piece color-coded knife set includes 6 knives with matching knife covers; Knives include: paring knife, utility knife, Santoku knife, carving knife, chef’s knife, and bread knife
Unique color-coded system for quick knife identification and to reduce the risk of cross-contamination during food preparation
Durable stainless-steel blades effectively hold a sharp cutting edge for safe, efficient use
Nonstick color coating helps prevent food from sticking to the blade for faster, easier cutting
Ergonomic handles promote a secure, comfortable grip; Matching blade guards protect blades and allow for safe storage in a drawer

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I am very very happy with the knife set purchased from Amazon. (It is Amazon basic brand.) I’ve never had a knife set that came with covers - probably because it is the sharpest set of knives that I have ever had. I really think that’s all anybody needs to know.. I love the bright colors, the covers, and I would encourage anyone who’s unsure to give it a try- the price the value and the product itself are really good

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love these. They’re very sharp & work great. So far I’ve chopped, cut and sliced with them & washed in the dishwasher and even hand washed some in bleach and they still look brand new. For the price these are great. I’ve only had them for about a month but so far I totally recommend them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Knives At A Great Price
reviews.reviewText: For a set of cheapos they are really great knives. Are extremely sharp and balance well in your hand. The covers come in handy also. Highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great knife set. Love them!
reviews.reviewText: These knives are well made. They are really sharp, the blade covers fit perfectly and the bright colors are gorgeous! My husband can hardly wait to use them as he loves to cook for us on his days off ! Win/win. 🤩

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These are fancy, colorful, and easy to use and clean. They are sharp, and durable and I have had no chipping or staining as of yet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Very well made & sharp knives. U need very little effort when slicing meat or chopping vegetables. Love the covers which keeps them sharp & safe. Well worth the money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Colorful and useful
reviews.reviewText: These are good knives and decent value for $$. I really like the different colors. It helps me pick out the knife i need from my knife stand really quickly. I actually bought 2 sets so we have plenty to use while others are in the dishwasher.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Mom loved them!
reviews.reviewText: Nice little gift at Christmas for mom. She said these knives are super sharp,and having a plastic sheath for each blade is a great addition..The diff colors make them easy to identify. Highly recommend. Great value! Thank you.

These are super durable and incredibly sharp. They are working very well for me - great value for money in terms of their actual function! They do *look* cheap, so if you care about aesthetics, that's something to be aware of.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: Quality Knives for Every Kitchen Task
reviews.reviewText: The Amazon Basics 12-Piece Colored Knife Set provides an affordable and reliable assortment of essential knives for countless kitchen tasks. Available in a range of vibrant colors, each knife is constructed from durable stainless steel blades and ergonomic handles. The set includes key knives like a chef's knife, slicing knife, bread knife, utility knife, paring knife, and six steak knives.The knives are precisely sharpened for ease of use right out of the box. The triple-riveted full tang construction ensures excellent balance and stability, even when tackling dense foods. The knife handles have a secure grip, providing comfort and control while chopping, slicing, and dicing. The colorful knives make a fun and practical addition to any kitchen.With the Amazon Basics Knife Set, you get exceptional performance and versatility without the high price tag. The sharp blades retain their edge well with proper care. The included blade guard protects the knives when stored in a drawer or knife block. Whether you need to chop an onion, carve a roast, or slice bread, this knife set has you covered.For home cooks looking for an all-in-one knife set solution, the Amazon Basics 12-Piece Colored Knife Set is a top choice. The quality and functionality rival more expensive brands at a budget-friendly price point. The bold, vibrant colors also make these knives easy to find when rummaging through a crowded drawer. For reliable, everyday knives to tackle meal prep, the Amazon Basics Knife Set is a sharp purchase.
